name: Guns and Notes
description: Choose from different music genres. Select your favorite gun. Upload your favorite tune and shoot those notes away! Pure fun and entertainment that allows you to immerse yourself in the virtual world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i7 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: N/A Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
